category: news
title: "Cathie Wood explains how the artificial intelligence boom could propel Ark's Innovation ETF"
excerpt: "Ark's Innovation fund, which focuses on disruptive technologies such as AI, has gained 17% this year as of Thursday's close. The fund's rise has coincided with the boom in AI-driven mega-cap tech, though has underperformed the Invesco QQQ Trust, which has risen 35% in the same period."
